tika.dc.description:
Book Two of The Alliance Series.

How far would you go to save the girl you love? Would you sacrifice your best friend?

Riley is reunited with his best friend after years of not knowing if he was still alive. Instead of a long awaited hug, he’s staring down the barrel of a gun and is taken captive by the one person he loved more than anyone. Can he forgive Brody for risking his crew once he knows what’s at stake for him, and can his friend forgive himself for what he did to save Trina?

Full of unexpected twists, Book Two of the Alliance Series will you keep you guessing at every turn. It is a heartbreaking journey of self discovery, forgiveness and redemption you don’t want to miss.
tika.dc.subject: Young Adult Dystopian
